fullText: This revival, starring Blair Underwood as Stanley and Nicole Ari Parker as Blanche, never finds the savage poetry that makes Tennessee Williams's 1947 masterpiece so devastating.
dtliExcerpt: This revival, starring Blair Underwood as Stanley and Nicole Ari Parker as Blanche, never finds the savage poetry that makes Tennessee Williams's 1947 masterpiece so devastating.
